translations: 付还（reimburse 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Owners who have already paid for repairs will be reimbursed.
sentences.translation: 已经付了修缮费的业主将会得到退费。

sentences.sentence: You will be reimbursed for any loss or damage caused by our company.
sentences.translation: 如我公司给您造成损失或有所损坏，您都将得到赔偿。

sentences.sentence: In a poll of 1500 family physicians, only 15% had used it in their practices but 90% said they would if it were appropriately reimbursed.
sentences.translation: 一项涉及1500名家庭医生的民意调查显示，只有15%的家庭医生使用过远程医疗，不过90%的医生表示有相应补偿的话他们也愿意使用远程医疗。
